Class CPSListFirstRequest

java.lang.Object
  org.cps.api.CPSRequest

          org.cps.api.request.CPSListFirstRequest

public class CPSListFirstRequest
extends CPSListLastRetrieveFirstRequest

The CPS_ListFirstRequest class is a wrapper for the CPSListLastRetrieveFirstRequest class for list-first requests

See Also:
CPSListLastRetrieveFirstResponse
